column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=How do you manage the continuity of your work ?
#Text=I tend to plan stuff out in story arcs .
#Text=So I 'll plan , I 'll plot something that 's maybe four issues long to six issues long and have that quite nailed down before I start writing the first issue .
#Text=So I try to think of a volume , [ ... ] as the finished book .

#Text=So every book should have kind of its own tone , and its own story-line , even if you are writing something much longer , it 's going to be split up into volumes , and I would like each volume to have its own feel .
#Text=As a child whom did you aspire to be ?
#Text=I mean I wanted to be a writer , kind of always .
#Text=There was a times where I took it more seriously than others , there was times I just sort of did n't write very much , like , " Oh yeah , that 's fine , I will get back to it " .
#Text=What are the projects you are currently working on ?
#Text=Projects
#Text=I am currently working on : Lucifer .
#Text=Issue two comes out on this coming Wednesday , and we are way out ahead with the scripts and with the art , so that 's taking a lot of my time .
#Text=I 'm also just finishing up Deep Roots of Vault Comics which is sort an " eco-thriller " create-your-own-thing , it 's a great book .
#Text=And I have been working on , I think three other things I ca n't talk about yet .
#Text=Have you seen the movie adaptation of Assassin 's Creed ?
#Text=I have , yeah !
#Text=What do you think about that movie ?
#Text=It 's great .
#Text=I mean , the exciting thing about Assassin 's Creed as a franchise is that everything is a single continuity and I do n't think any other franchise has really done that .
#Text=If you look at , like the Marvel films and the Marvel comics :
#Text=they 're separate things and they do n't affect each other .
#Text=But with Assassin 's Creed , the film , the games , and the comics are all one direct continuity .
#Text=So watching stuff from that film , which I know affects stuff in the book I write and vice-versa was really really cool .
#Text=If you had a message for your younger self , what it would be ?
#Text=My younger self ?
#Text=Probably just tell him to just actually start writing stuff .
#Text=Start writing stuff .
#Text=Carry a notebook !
#Text=When you carry a notebook , that 's when you start , I think that 's when I became an actual writer .
#Text=I guess that was all .
#Text=Do you mind if I take a photo of yours ?
#Text=Yeah , sure !
#Text=No problem .
#Text=Interview with Cuban comic book artist Vanesa Del Rey
